title: Update regarding BankOne
story_body:
BankOne (BANKO) reported its financial results for the quarter ended 2023-02-28 at 16:00 EST. 

BankOne's total revenue reached $12.5 billion, marking a 15% increase from $10.9 billion in the comparable period last year. The company's sales growth was driven by a 20% rise in its core banking segment, which contributed $8.2 billion to total revenue. 

BankOne's revenue growth was also fueled by a 10% increase in its investment banking division, which generated $2.1 billion in revenue. The company's consumer lending business saw a 12% rise in revenue, reaching $1.5 billion. 

BankOne's revenue growth outpaced the industry average, indicating the company's strong market position. The company's ability to drive sales growth across its core business segments bodes well for its future financial performance. 

The financial results were released after the market close on 2023-02-28, and the company's management will host a conference call at 08:00 EST on 2023-03-01 to discuss the results in further detail.
